mapper.select: select * from sys_user u left join leave_record lr on (u.user_id = lr.employee_id and date_format(lr.start_date, '%Y-%m-%d') <= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') and date_format(lr.end_date, '%Y-%m-%d') >= date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d')) left join attendance_record ar on (ar.employee_number = u.employee_number and date_format(ar.date, '%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d') ) where u.del_flag = '0'
